posts.text:
Hey everyone,

Just writing to say hi. While I'm not thrilled to be a part of your club, you can't kick me out and I'm very glad you are here!

I'm recovering from my 2/12 nephrouterectomy, and while I'm hopeful that my surgeon got it all, after finding it in 3 lymph nodes, I'm gearing up for the next battle.  Looking into 
	clinical trials
.

Reach out if:

You have any comments on my signature summary
You are a fellow upper-tracter...we are the elite 5%
You have any experience with Tecentriq or customized vaccines to share
Your liver rejected GemCis...that stuff sucks anyway
You need tech support or you want to develop a game (proof of cancer required...send samples to my lab)
posts.topic: Upper tract urothelial carcinoma with lymph node spread
